commits.author: bi
commits.summary: Fix several bugs for function match
commits.body:
1. "storage.modifier.local.lua" captured "local" with all the trailing whitespaces
2. "entity.name.function.lua" captured function name with all previous and trailing whitespaces, also if `.` was used in the function name, the second part of the function name was captured as "punctuation.definition.parameters.begin"
3. "punctuation.definition.parameters.begin" never captured `(`
4. 7 captured instances instead of 4

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Avoid using the ambiguous \h shorthand character
commits.body: Depending on the regular expression engine used, \h does not always mean the same. With a PCRE engine, it matches white spaces, whereas, with a Oniguruma engine, it matches hexademical digit characters. Atom uses an Oniguruma engine, but github.com relies on a PCRE engine.
